main event: A light was observed flashing on and off silently for 1-2 seconds in Casper, Wyoming.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on August 28, 1962,The object moved west before disappearing behind trees,The duration of the sighting was very brief,No physical evidence was found to support the sighting,The weather conditions were reported as clear at the time of the observation.
sighted object: a light flashing on and off
